transform.comment: # Convert between simplified and traditional Chinese
# UTRANS_FORWARD is from simplified to traditional
transform.tRule: $SCDigit = [零一二三四五六七八九十百千万亿两] ;
$TCDigit = [零一二三四五六七八九十百千萬億兩] ;
transform.comment: # complex mappings for which there is no easy solution
# does not handle the surnames 于 or 於
# 乾 appears in the most compounds
transform.tRule: 宫商角徵羽↔宮商角徵羽;
生旦淨末丑↔生旦净末丑;
transform.comment: # separate readings for po1 or po4 from pu2
transform.tRule: # 沈 is a surname in hans and hant
墨渖未干↔墨瀋未乾; # 瀋 meaning liquid
石沉大海↔石沈大海; # 沈 meaning sink
